sentence.text: We identified 22 genes including cellular response to DNA damage stimulus, KRAS, TP53, adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway, NRAS, transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, ARID2, and phosphorylation with non-silent mutations in the cancer Census Genes.

entity.text: cellular response to DNA damage stimulus
adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway
transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: Five HGCAs harbored either mono-allelic (four HGCAs) or bi-allelic (one HGCA) transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway mutation or 18q loss that had been known as early carcinoma-specific changes.

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: Our WES data is largely matched with the earlier 'adenoma-carcinoma model' (APC, positive regulation of protein phosphorylation, NRAS and adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway mutations), but there are newly identified SMAD4, regulation of cell growth, G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle, GNAQ, protein phosphorylation, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, EP300, nucleosome disassembly, regulation of cell adhesion and cellular response to mechanical stimulus mutations in this study.

entity.text: adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway
G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
